title: Genetically correction of Down syndrome_1
treatment_protocol_ch1: Each iPSC line was differentiated to ECs by using MiraCell iPS Cell to Endothelial Cell Differentiation Kit (Takara bio) following the manufacturer's protocol.
growth_protocol_ch1: iPSC-derived ECs were maintained in MiraCell EC Culture Medium (Takara bio) with antibiotics in humidified atmosphere with 5% CO2 at 37C.
extract_protocol_ch1: RNA was extracted using NucleoSpin (Takara Bio) following the manufacturer’s procedure.
extract_protocol_ch1.1: Library preparation was performed using the TruSeq stranded mRNA sample prep kit (Illumina).
data_processing: An Illumina HiSeq 2500 platform in 75-base single-end mode was used for sequencing.
data_processing.1: Illumina CASAVA 1.8.2 software was used for base calling.
data_processing.2: Sequenced reads were mapped to the human reference genome sequence (hg19) using TopHat version 2.0.13 in combination with Bowtie2 version 2.2.3 and SAMtools version 0.1.19.
data_processing.3: Fragments per kilobase of exon per million mapped fragments were calculated using Cuffnorm version 2.2.1.
data_processing.4: Ingenuity Pathway Analysis was used to identify canonical pathways of differentially expressed genes.
data_processing.6: Supplementary files format and content: tab-delimited text files include FPKM values for each Sample
